title: Manassas National Battlefield Park: Donate
body: Donate       Thank you for your interest in supporting Manassas National Battlefield Park. The park is able to accept tax-deductible donations directly. Please send donations to:  Park Superintendent Manassas National Battlefield Park 12521 Lee Highway Manassas, VA 20109 For additional information, please call (703) 754-1861.     Official Park Partner:  Manassas Battlefield Trust The Manassas Battlefield Trust is a valued partner of the National Park Service and supports the protection and preservation of Manassas National Battlefield Park through education, partnerships and philanthropy. To support the Park and join the Trust, please go to http://manassasbattlefield.org/donate/
